sitelinks.title: Alkanes & Cycloalkanes
sitelinks.snippet: The properties of organic molecules depend on the structure, and knowing the names of organic compounds allow us to communicate with other chemists. We'll be learning about different aspects of molecular structure, including common functional groups and conformations.

sitelinks.snippet: Learn about substitution and elimination reactions in organic chemistry with Khan Academy's comprehensive lessons and interactive exercises.

sitelinks.title: Structure and Bonding
sitelinks.snippet: Let's review the basics of chemical bonds including dot structures, hybridization, bond-line structures, electronegativity, and polarity. We will also discuss how bonding and intermolecular forces relate to physical properties such as boiling point.

sitelinks.title: Khan Academy
sitelinks.snippet: Let's review how to keep track of electrons using formal charges, oxidation states, oxidation-reduction reactions, and resonance structures. We will also go over the principles of acid-base chemistry.

organic_results.title: Organic Chemistry - Chemistry LibreTexts
